action_result: By clicking on the search result ad in the last screenshot, I have accessed the website for the apartment community being advertised, which is indicated by the change in the URL and the content shown in the current screenshot. To find the specific information on rental costs, the next actionable step would be to click on the "Prices / Availability" option or the "CHECK AVAILABILITY" button on the website.
